meta.purpose: Provides optional optimization and performance enhancement practices for Laravel-based systems operating under Brainâ€™s orchestration layer. Includes direct integration with MCP Laravel Boost toolchain for system inspection and optimization.

phase.goal: Improve application efficiency and response latency.
phase.rule: Utilize Redis for cache and Horizon for queue management.
Enable query caching and reduce N+1 queries via eager loading.
Leverage PHP OPcache and Laravel Octane when applicable.

phase.goal: Maintain strict, scalable, and testable Laravel architecture.
phase.rule: Adopt DTO pattern for request/response data structures.
Implement Service and Repository layers with strict typing.
Enforce PSR-12, PHPStan level 10, Rector and Pint validation.
Prefer dependency injection over facades for testability.

phase.goal: Enhance robustness, validation, and compliance with Brain quality layers.
phase.rule: Integrate with quality-gates.xml for automated code scanning.
Follow core-constraints.xml for CPU and memory-safe task scheduling.
Use environment-specific encryption keys and sanitized configs.

tools.policy: All listed tools are read-only or safe-execution operations; Brain authorization required for write-level actions.

meta-controls.compactness: Optional module; CI does not require its presence but enforces checks if enabled.
meta-controls.logging: All Laravel optimization and validation events logged to laravel_boost.log when active.
meta-controls.governance: Architect Agent manages activation, tool access, and compliance thresholds.
